en:
八亿两千万美元
(Bā yì liǎng qiān wàn měiyuán)

Eight hundred and twenty million US dollars

Translations of 八亿两千万美元
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

八亿 两 千万 美元
    Eight hundred and twenty million US dollars, Eight hundred twenty million US dollars, Eight hundred and twenty million U.S. dollars, Eight hundred twenty million U.S. dollars, $ Eight hundred and twenty million
